title: Did bedtime mode disappear with recent security update?
content:
Bedtime mode seems to have disappeared or stopped working with my recent security update on my Pixel 3.

I was able to add it to my pull down menu from the top, but when I click it, it goes to an all black page where I am unable to turn it on or do anything other than go back. 

I saw that maybe it had been added to the clock app, but it isn't there either.

Is it broken for everyone? Is there a way to bring it back?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
